category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_PLMXML_IMPORT_EXISTING_SCHEDULE
preference.preference_description: Allows re-importing a schedule that is already in the system. Set to False to block the import of the schedule that is already in the system. Valid Values: True - Re-imports the schedule after deleting all of its related data. False - Blocks import operation if the schedule is already present in the system.
